The stall is owned by TzHaar-Hur-Rin as part of TzHaar-Hur-Rin's Ore and Gem Store and players can steal from it if they have a thieving level of 75 or higher. Object ID30280

Shop Counter (gems) is a unique Gem stall found in Mor Ul Rek. The stall is owned by TzHaar-Hur-Rin as part of TzHaar-Hur-Rin's Ore and Gem Store and players can steal from it if they have a thieving level of 75 or higher. A variety of gems can be stolen and unlike other gem stalls they have a chance to be cut rather than uncut.

Contents

  • 1 Thieving info
    • 1.1 Mor Ul Rek
      • 1.1.1 Pre-roll
      • 1.1.2 Gem type
  • 2 References

Thieving info[edit | edit source]

Shop Counter (gems)
Level required 75
Thieving XP160 xp
TypeStall

Mor Ul Rek[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.[1]

Each time a gem is successfully looted, there is a 2/3 chance of it being cut instead of uncut.

Pre-roll[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Onyx11/50,0001,934,564120,000

If the roll for an onyx fails, you then roll for the remaining gem types. Once you have rolled a gem you then roll again to decide if it's cut or uncut.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. â†‘ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 12 May 2020. (Archived from the original on 29 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "First, those role 1/50k for an onyx. If that fails, they roll out of 1000: 1 - dragonstone 49 - diamond 150 - ruby 300 - emerald 500 - sapphire The chance is 2/3 of the gem being [cut]."
